americanFootballQuestions.text: Which quarterback holds the NFL record for most passing yards in a single season?
americanFootballQuestions.explanation: Peyton Manning holds the NFL record with 5,477 passing yards in the 2013 season with the Denver Broncos.

americanFootballQuestions.text: Which team won Super Bowl LIV (54)?
americanFootballQuestions.explanation: The Kansas City Chiefs defeated the San Francisco 49ers 31-20 in Super Bowl LIV on February 2, 2020.

americanFootballQuestions.text: Who was the first overall pick in the 2020 NFL Draft?
americanFootballQuestions.explanation: Joe Burrow was selected first overall by the Cincinnati Bengals in the 2020 NFL Draft.

americanFootballQuestions.text: Which NFL team is known as 'America's Team'?
americanFootballQuestions.explanation: The Dallas Cowboys have been known as 'America's Team' since the late 1970s.

americanFootballQuestions.text: Who holds the NFL record for most rushing yards in a single game?
americanFootballQuestions.explanation: Adrian Peterson holds the NFL record with 296 rushing yards in a single game, achieved on November 4, 2007, against the San Diego Chargers.

basketballQuestions.text: Who holds the NBA record for most points scored in a single game?
basketballQuestions.explanation: Wilt Chamberlain scored 100 points for the Philadelphia Warriors against the New York Knicks on March 2, 1962.

basketballQuestions.text: Which team won the first NBA championship?
basketballQuestions.explanation: The Philadelphia Warriors won the first BAA (Basketball Association of America, which later became the NBA) championship in 1947.

basketballQuestions.text: Who was the first WNBA player to dunk in a game?
basketballQuestions.explanation: Lisa Leslie made history on July 30, 2002, becoming the first woman to dunk in a WNBA game.

basketballQuestions.text: Which NBA player has won the most championship rings?
basketballQuestions.explanation: Bill Russell won 11 NBA championships with the Boston Celtics between 1957 and 1969.

basketballQuestions.text: Which college basketball team has won the most NCAA men's championships?
basketballQuestions.explanation: UCLA has won 11 NCAA men's basketball championships, with 10 of them coming under legendary coach John Wooden.
